0503.name: NOT_INITIALIZED
0503.message:
No Internet connection has been set up.

Please set up an Internet connection
in System Settings â‡’ Internet.
0503.short_description: Internet connection settings for the targeted slot have not been set up.
0503.long_description: (CONNECTION SLOT 3) Internet connection settings for the targeted slot have not been set up.
0503.short_solution: Set up a connection in internet connection settings and try again.
0503.long_solution: Go to System Settings then Internet Settings and set up a connection in slot 3, or set the default connection to a different slot that has already been configured.
